name: 2D Shooter - Finished
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project. 

Modifications:

1. The cursor in the main menu has been changed.

2. The buttons now react when you click on them. 

3. Added instructions on the objective of the game and how to play. 

4. Added three levels to the tutorial version to a total of six levels. 

5. The menu buttons were made larger in the level select screen and the instructions screen. 

6. Emboldened the score and the high score text. 

7. Attempted to add a feeling of progression through the game by changing where the player spawns initially. 

Credits:

Created by Vinnie LaPenna
